name: Lilith's Mansion
description:
Ava has discovered a mansion with a strange doll inside that wants to... make a party?? Help Lilith gather the things to play with her... or else...

CONTROLS

MOVE:  WASD

INTERACT: LEFT CLICK

PICK UP ITEMS: E

LEAVE ITEMS: Q

RESTART LEVEL: R + P

Credits

Programmer: Orolock

Voice Actress (Lilith): Lady Yami

3D Artist: TheHibiscusPoet

Sound: Saturn
